mapper.sql: QNO, QTITLE, QCONTENT, MEMBERID, regdate, (sysdate-regdate)*24 as newImgTerm
mapper.insert:
select qna_seq.nextval from dual
insert into qna(qno, qtitle, qcontent, memberid) values(#{qNo}, #{qTitle}, #{qContent}, #{memberid})

select qnare_seq.nextval from dual
insert into qnare(qrno, qno, id, content, parent) values(#{qrNo}, #{qNo}, #{id}, #{content}, 0)
mapper.select: select qrno, qno, id, content, to_char(regdate,'YYYY.MM.DD. HH24:MI') as regdate, parent, levels, (sysdate-regdate)*24 as newImgTerm from qnare where qno=#{qNo} order by qrno
mapper.insert: insert into qnare(qrno, qno, id, content, parent, levels) values(qnare_seq.nextval, #{qNo}, #{id}, #{content}, #{qrNo}, +1)
mapper.select: select qrno, qno, id, content, to_char(regdate,'YYYY.MM.DD. HH24:MI') as regdate, parent, levels from qnare where levels=1 order by qrno
